page.description: The "PhoneGap - Scan Barcode" action allows you to scan barcodes in a PhoneGap application.

section.description: The builder for the action is shown in the image below. You can define an onSuccess Javascript event handler that gets called if the scan was successful. You Javascript code can reference:

item.name: result.cancelled
item.description: 0 if the scan was successful, 1 if the user cancelled the scan

section.description: IMPORTANT: When you build the PhoneGap application be sure to select the Bar Code Scanner plugin in the Third Party PhoneGap Plugins section.

item.name: Prefer front camera
item.description: Specify if the front or back camera should be used.

item.name: Show flip camera button
item.description: Should the flip camera button be shown?

item.name: Prompt
item.description: Android only. Specify the prompt to be shown when the scanner is opened.

item.name: Orientation
item.description: Android only. Set to 'Rotate' so that the scanner rotates with the device orientation.

item.name: onSuccess
item.description: Code to run if the scan is successful.

item.name: onFailure
item.description: Code to run if the SMS fails.
